pr_title: Improved validation against imported ecore meta model

timeline.message:

timeline.bodyText: is this an expected case or an error case?

replies.bodyText: It used to be there. I think it doesn't really happen in practice but I wanted to keep the catch clause.
replies.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: do we want to add a since anyway?

timeline.bodyText: do we need instanceof EClass check here?
timeline.author: cdietrich

replies.bodyText: EReferences will return an EClass from their type. I can add an explicit cast to f1 and use getEReferenceType instead.
replies.author: szarnekow
